SELECT t1.*, COALESCE(SUM(t2.pv), 0) AS today_pv, COALESCE(SUM(t2.uv), 0) AS today_uv, COALESCE(SUM(t2.uip), 0) AS today_uip FROM t_link AS t1 LEFT JOIN t_link_access_stats AS t2 ON t2.full_short_url = t1.full_short_url AND t2.date = CURDATE() WHERE t1.gid = #{dto.gid} GROUP BY t1.id ORDER BY
today_pv DESC
today_uv DESC
today_uip DESC
total_pv DESC
total_uv DESC
total_uip DESC
create_time DESC
